text: 2 June 2024, around 8pm++ - The cashier is very rude. Scan the brg while playing the phone..make a face. Put the receipt like that. NO COMMUNICATION AT ALL. THE WORST ATTITUDE EVER.! Kot even has a personal problem, no need to show it publicly, no need to give tempias to the customer. Dear 99 Speedmart management, pls have a proper training to your staff n please monitor your staff closely. Dropping the store's image.. huhhhh!!
